CheckForUpdates.checkingDesc: Please wait while we check for updates...
CheckForUpdates.availableDesc: A new version is available and will be downloaded automatically.
CheckForUpdates.downloadedDesc: Update has been downloaded successfully. Restart the application to install the new version.
CheckForUpdates.errorDesc: Unable to check for updates. Please try again later.
CheckForUpdates.idleDesc: Click the button to check for available updates.
CheckForUpdates.restartPrompt: The application will automatically update when you restart it.
